summary: Summary Mental Health Counselor specializing in Art and Play Therapies. Responsible self-starter who communicates well and is dedicated to improving the well-being of clients. Mental health professional driven to help others overcome personal obstacles. Comfortable working autonomously or in a team-based setting. Clinically certified Mental Health Therapist skilled at motivating, communicating and advocating for clients dealing with mental health and emotional disorders. Expert in DBT and psychotherapy. Seasoned mental health practitioner with demonstrated track record of successfully working with diverse client populations in one-on-one and group settings. Skilled Therapist with expertise on the identification and management of youth mental illnesses. Seasoned mental health practitioner with demonstrated track record of successfully working with diverse client populations in one-on-one and group settings. Mental health professional driven to help others overcome personal obstacles. Comfortable working autonomously or in a team-based setting.

experience.title: Co-Founder/Therapist and Teaching Artist
experience.description: Served as lead clinician for patients with bipolar, depression, anxiety and personality disorders. Used therapies including psychodynamic, family systems, cognitive behavioral and lifespan integration psychotherapy. Consulted on treatment and rehabilitation plans for dually diagnosed clients. Recorded patient histories and coordinated plans with multi-disciplinary teams. Diagnosed mental health, emotional and substance abuse disorders. Implemented risk assessments and mitigation strategies. Led individual, family, group and marital therapy; evaluated need for inpatient transfer. Guided clients in understanding illnesses and treatment plans. Created master treatment and discharge plans; referred clients to other programs and community agencies. Organized treatment projects focused on problem solving and creative thinking. Coordinated with psychiatrists on medication changes and efficacy. Worked with parents and teachers to implement consistent behavior therapy techniques at home and school. Taught anger management, relaxation, impulse control, social skills, emotional coping skills and functional living skills. Developed comprehensive treatment plans for accurate diagnosis and behavioral treatment. Collaborated with clinical staff and external resources; conducted outreach, advocacy and rehabilitative services for regular and crisis cases. Documented service plans and progress notes. Conducted comprehensive in-home psychosocial assessments prior to wraparound meetings. Managed time and caseloads with 50+ sessions per week. Ensured safety by checking facilities for hazards and maintaining client files.

experience.title: CPS Specialist III
experience.description: Effectively managed time and caseloads based on 50+ sessions per week. Charted and recorded information in client files. Tracked client movement on and off the unit and responded to crisis situations. Conducted initial in-home psychosocial assessments prior to wraparound meetings. Gathered information from families and social services agencies to inform treatment plans. Documented all patient information including service plans, treatment reports and progress notes. Conducted outreach, advocacy and rehabilitative services for regular cases and crisis intervention. Collaborated with treatment teams to coordinate client care services; interacted with clinical staff and external resources. Developed comprehensive treatment plans focusing on accurate diagnosis and behavioral treatment. Taught clients anger management, relaxation, impulse control, social skills, emotional coping skills and functional living skills. Worked with parents and teachers to implement consistent behavior therapy techniques; consulted with psychiatrists about medication changes and adherence. Created and reviewed master treatment and discharge plans; guided clients in understanding illnesses and treatment plans. Developed policies for identification of medically-related social and emotional needs. Assisted clients with scheduling home visits and calls; monitored effectiveness. Evaluated patients for psychiatric services and psychotropic medications; administered medications when needed. Conducted psychiatric evaluations and medication management for inpatient and outpatient facilities.

experience.title: Therapist
experience.description: Effectively managed time and caseloads based on 50+ sessions per week. Charted and recorded information in client files. Responded quickly to crisis situations. Conducted comprehensive initial in-home psychosocial assessments prior to wraparound meetings. Gathered information from families and social services agencies to inform treatment plans. Documented all patient information including service plans, treatment reports and progress notes. Conducted outreach, advocacy and rehabilitative services for regular cases and crisis intervention. Collaborated with treatment teams to coordinate client care services. Taught clients anger management techniques, relaxation skills, impulse control, social skills, emotional coping skills and functional living skills. Worked with parents and teachers to implement consistent behavior therapy techniques at home and school. Consulted with psychiatrists about medication changes and adherence. Created and reviewed master treatment and discharge plans; guided clients in understanding illnesses and treatment plans. Developed policies for medically-related social and emotional needs of clients. Assisted clients with scheduling home visits and calls; monitored effectiveness. Evaluated patients for psychiatric services and psychotropic medications; administered medications as needed. Conducted psychiatric evaluations and medication management for both inpatient and outpatient facilities.
